title: Camera Mixed-Signal IC Applications Engineer (m/f/d)
summary: We live in a mobile and device driven world where knowledge of the physical world around us is needed...
description: Working with cross-functional teams including mechanical, optical, firmware, product/test and camera systems engineers to evaluate performance specifications, optimal HW/SW/FW system partitioning and interfacing. Validation, integration and support of camera HW chipsets (developed and under development) across multiple systems and modules...
preferred_qualifications: Broad range of engineering knowledge and/or expertise. Sharp problem-solving skills and critical thinking. Past experience of independence in designing complex systems. Preferred MS, or Ph.D. in Electrical and Computer Engineering, or BS with relevant work experience.
